epub_gen¶

Classes designed to generate EPUB files

class librepy.epub_gen.EpubGenerator(destination_dir, publication)[source]¶

EPUB file generator.

Variables:
  • destination_dir – directory to generate EPUB file into
  • publication – Publication object which EPUB file will be based on
generate_epub()[source]¶

Generates epub file structure and produce final archive
